attributes.action: help mental health service users obtain Direct Payments to help purchase support (in lieu of MH services ) to socially include their lives better in Society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a poverty of joined up quality in the NHS and Social Care agencies in the field of Direct Payments to Mental Health Users and it is delaying their ability to be socially included and have control of their lives which enhances their health.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "help mental health service users obtain Direct Payments to help purchase support (in lieu of MH services ) to socially include their lives better in Society."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15885.asp

Prime Minister's Office
